tire iron.name: tire iron
tire iron.description: Like what you'd use to change your tire. Hefty and handy in a pinch.

axe.name: axe
axe.description: It's a two handed fireman's axe.

handgun.name: handgun
handgun.description: A standard issue Beretta M9 sidearm.

m249.name: m249
m249.description: A light machine gun. An elegant weapon for a more civilized age.

big bertha.name: big bertha
big bertha.description: Heavy and futuristic looking... You're not exactly sure what it is. A small placard says, "Point this end toward enemy." and has the words "Ol' Reliable" scratched into the metal.

bandages.name: bandages
bandages.description: Common bandages that only covers small wounds.

antibiotics.name: antibiotics
antibiotics.description: Cures only bacterial infections, and cannot neutralize the zombie infection

first aid kit.name: first aid kit
first aid kit.description: This kit has everything you need to bring someone back to life.

body armor.name: body armor
body armor.description: "Your to be best friend.", that's what they say when you first join the military.

squad equipment upgrades.name: squad equipment upgrades
squad equipment upgrades.description: Epic upgrades to your squads combat capability!
